visual_enhancers.gradients: None for backgrounds. Subtle linear-gradient for primary button hover only.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle dot grid pattern in the welcome screen background (opacity 0.4).

images.description: Minimalist developer workspace with keyboard, used for Welcome Screen right panel.
Friendly professional recruiter avatar for the chatbot header.
Example partner logo (Atlassian) for social proof.

media.icons: Lucide React (already installed). Use: MessageSquare, User, Code, CheckCircle, Send, X, ChevronRight.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-900 on White, or White on Primary Blue.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2 on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria_labels: Required for all icon-only buttons (e.g., Send button).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install fonts 'Outfit', 'DM Sans', 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.css.
2. LAYOUT: Create a 'ChatLayout' component that handles the sticky header and floating input area.
3. STATE: Use a simple array for messages. Each message object should have { id, role: 'bot'|'user', content, type: 'text'|'options'|'code' }.
4. INTERACTION: When the bot asks for Tech Stack, render a grid of clickable 'Pills' instead of a text input. User clicks pills then 'Confirm'.
5. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' (if available) or Tailwind 'animate-in' classes for message bubbles appearing.
6. MOCK DATA: Mock the AI response logic. Simple if/else or a small state machine for the screening flow (Greeting -> Name -> Exp -> Stack -> Questions -> End).
7. CRITICAL: Do not use 'alert()' for validation. Use inline error text or toast notifications (Sonner).
8. THEME: Default to Light Mode. Dark mode is optional but if implemented, ensure high contrast (Slate-900 bg).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI' aesthetics (purple gradients, robot icons).
Use 2-3x more padding than you think is necessary.
Micro-interactions are mandatory (hover states, focus rings).
Never use 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use realistic recruitment copy.
